name: Julian Loves Music
bio: Host Julian McCullough has spun off the hugely popular Doug Loves Movies podcast and made Julian Loves Music. The live podcast taping will feature hilarious comedian and musician guests as well as dumb games and a prize bag for one lucky audience member.
copy: Host Julian McCullough has spun off the hugely popular Doug Loves Movies podcast and made Julian Loves Music. The live podcast taping will feature hilarious comedian and musician guests as well as dumb games and a prize bag for one lucky audience member. If you plan on coming, make yourself a name tag out of an iconic album cover and you could be that lucky gal or fella!
